message:
Compilation errors, please fix and try again.

scrambler.c: In function ‘main’:
scrambler.c:15:9: error: ‘ch’ undeclared (first use in this function); did you mean ‘char’?
   15 |         ch = fgetc(ptr);
      |         ^~
      |         char
scrambler.c:15:9: note: each undeclared identifier is reported only once for each function it appears in
scrambler.c:15:20: error: ‘ptr’ undeclared (first use in this function)
   15 |         ch = fgetc(ptr);
      |                    ^~~
